meanings.definition: To post (something) again on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: I will repost the funny cat video on my profile.
meanings.sent2: She decided to repost the article for more people to see.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken repost its photo? To get more likes!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a repost of joy.
meanings.sent5: The idea kept nagging at him, demanding a repost in his mind.

meanings.definition: A post that has been posted again on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: The repost of the meme got many likes.
meanings.sent2: He shared the repost of the news article with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The repost sat quietly among the other posts, waiting to be noticed.
meanings.sent4: The repost was like an echo of the original post, reaching new audiences.
meanings.sent5: The repost stood out like a bright star in the sea of posts.
